1.title: beginning

11.content:
Name: (nickname) Quentin
Species: human

11.title: human normal(macro)

15.content: well let's start with who you incarnate so don't forget to give a description of your character and your rules.
15.title: other

info.brief_description: interactive story between a normal person and a giant person (roleplay)
info.description:
this a simple you will choose to be a normal size person or a giant, it will require a description of your character. so a story has 2 people who are the giant person and the normal person

forbidden to die, so no death,
no women(possible to add secondary women who don't have too much interest)
you could embody whoever you wanted, a human, an anthro, a superhero, a super villain, etc.
possible to have several characters (2 macro and 1 giant or 2 giant and 1 macro etc) but this must be done at the beginning of the chapter by the first person if he accepts several writer / reader.
respect the previous chapter.
all the rest is allow
the roleplay can be played solo, only if you create the two characters (macro + giant).
only the person who created the character can control it.
the first character can include these rules, if he wants to put a rule against the basic rules he must have my authorization...


for free members: as you are limited in creation I suggest that you write me an email with the chapter link and the chapter you wanted to add, so I write it for you (I put your nickname at beginning). I am an Upgraded member.
